final_state.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Bob was found dead this morning.

Diana: Let's focus on any unusual activities or conversations from last night regarding Bob. I had a normal interaction with him during the day phase.

You said: I had a normal interaction with Bob during the day phase as well. Let's stay vigilant and keep an open dialogue to uncover any suspicious activities or conversations from last night regarding Bob.
